pageTitle: Refinance in San Diego, California - Bankrate.com
textBeforeTable: Here are the refinance mortgage rates as of 10 a.m. Sunday in San Diego, CA. The 30-year fixed refinance mortgage rates vary from 4.02 percent to 4.46 percent. Refinance mortgage rates in San Diego, California Check to find the best mortgage rates today. Now may be the best time for you to refinance, but using careful consideration and our guidelines will enable you to decide wisely. Our search function gives up-to-date information on the lowest refinance rates in San Diego and throughout the state of California. Considering a refinance in San Diego, CA? Then visit our site, where you will find tools, guides and calculators to help you make an informed decision.
